效能: 適用於體外診斷使用，作為監測血糖之用，可提供糖尿病患者自我檢測指尖微血管血糖值，或提供專業人員檢測靜脈或動脈全血及新生兒微血管之血糖值。
醫器規格:
1. RHEAMED Blood Glucose Monitoring System: one blood glucose meter, 10 pieces of blood glucose test strip, one lancet device (衛署醫器陸輸壹字第000507號), 10 pieces of lancet (衛署醫器陸輸壹字第000416號), one code strip, one vial of control solution, one carry bag, Logbook, Quick reference guide, owner’s booklet.2. RHEAMED Blood Glucose test strip package contains: 25 pieces of a Blood Glucose test strip and one code strip. 50 pieces of a Blood Glucose test strip and one code strip.3. Lancet (衛署醫器陸輸壹字第000416號): 50 pieces of Glucose Lancet, 100 pieces of Glucose Lancet, 200 pieces of Glucose Lancet, 500 pieces of Glucose Lancet.
